definition: erhua variant of 不起眼[bu4 qi3 yan3]

to rise/to raise/to get up/to set out/to start/to appear/to launch/to initiate (action)/to draft/to establish/to get (from a depot or counter)/verb suffix, to start/starting from (a time, place, price etc)/classifier for occurrences or unpredictable events: case, instance/classifier for groups: batch, group
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
variant of 人[ren2]/"person" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 10), occurring in 兒, 兀, 兄 etc

sentences.english: She was just a scrap of a thing.
sentences.chinese: 她是个不起眼儿的小东西。

sentences.english: He is not taken much notice of, but he is a very learned man.
sentences.chinese: 别看这人不起眼儿，人家可是一肚子学问。

sentences.english: If a part is insignificant, the greater our credit in making anything of it.
sentences.chinese: 如果哪个角色不起眼儿，我们演得好就更显得有本事。

sentences.english: The winning horse was a rank outsider.
sentences.chinese: 获胜的马是一匹完全不起眼儿的冷门马。

definition: see 灰不溜丟|灰不溜丢[hui1 bu5 liu1 diu1]
erhua variant of 飯館|饭馆[fan4 guan3]
erhua variant of 旮旯[ga1 la2]
erhua variant of 旁邊|旁边[pang2 bian1]
one yuan or less/around 80 cents or one dollar
variant of 黑糊糊[hei1 hu1 hu1]
